19-1242.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes for the State Legislation Committee meeting held Tuesday, October 23, 2018.A motion was made by Chair Austin, seconded by Member Richardson, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 2 - Richardson and Austin2.

19-1243.summary: Recommendation to receive and file staff's recommended updates and recommend additional updates to the 2020 State Legislative Agenda.Page 1 of 2411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARDCIVIC CHAMBERS, 4:00 PMTUESDAY, DECEMBER 17, 2019CITY OF LONG BEACHSTATE LEGISLATION COMMITTEE MINUTESJulia Katz, Government Affairs Analyst, spoke; and presented the staff report.Chair Austin spoke.Councilmember Richardson spoke.Julia Katz, Government Affairs Analyst, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Councilmember Richardson and Julia Katz, Government Affairs Analyst.A motion was made by Member Richardson, seconded by Chair Austin, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 2 - Richardson and Austin3.
